name: yangweijie/think-runtime
description: 高性能环境下运行的ThinkPHP Runtime扩展包，支持Swoole、RoadRunner、FrankenPHP等多种运行时

suggest.dunglas/frankenphp: Required for FrankenPHP runtime adapter (modern PHP app server)
suggest.react/http: Required for ReactPHP runtime adapter (event-driven async HTTP server)
suggest.react/socket: Required for ReactPHP runtime adapter (async socket server)
suggest.react/promise: Required for ReactPHP runtime adapter (promise implementation)
suggest.ringcentral/psr7: Required for ReactPHP runtime adapter (PSR-7 implementation)
suggest.cloudtay/ripple: Required for Ripple runtime adapter (high-performance coroutine HTTP server)
suggest.workerman/workerman: Required for Workerman runtime adapter (high-performance socket server framework)
suggest.runtime/bref: Required for Bref runtime adapter (AWS Lambda serverless runtime)
suggest.bref/bref: Required for Bref runtime adapter (AWS Lambda PHP runtime)
suggest.vercel/php: Required for Vercel runtime adapter (Vercel serverless functions)

post-install-cmd: @php -r "echo '下一步: 复制配置文件到你的ThinkPHP项目\n';"
